Package drawit.shapegroups2

Class NonleafShapeGroup

java.lang.Object
drawit.shapegroups2.ShapeGroup
drawit.shapegroups2.NonleafShapeGroup
public class NonleafShapeGroup
extends ShapeGroup
Invariants:
getSubgroups() == null || LogicalList.distinct(getSubgroups())
getSubgroups() == null || getSubgroups().stream().allMatch(g -> g != null && g.getParentGroup() == this)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NonleafShapeGroup​(ShapeGroup[] subgroups)
    Initializes this object to represent a non-leaf shape group that directly contains the given subgroups, in the given order.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<RoundedPolygon> getAllShapes()
    Returns the list of the RoundedPolygon objects contained directly or indirectly by this shape group, in depth-first order.

    Returns a textual representation of a sequence of drawing commands for drawing the shapes contained directly or indirectly by this shape group.

  • Constructor Details

    • NonleafShapeGroup

      public NonleafShapeGroup​(ShapeGroup[] subgroups)
      Initializes this object to represent a non-leaf shape group that directly contains the given subgroups, in the given order.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if subgroups is null 
      subgroups == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if subgroups has less than two elements 
      subgroups.length < 2
      IllegalArgumentException - if any element of subgroups is null 
      Arrays.stream(subgroups).anyMatch(g -> g == null)
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given subgroups are not distinct 
      !LogicalList.distinct(List.of(subgroups))
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the given subgroups already has a parent 
      Arrays.stream(subgroups).anyMatch(g -> g.getParentGroup() != null)
      Inspects:
      subgroups
      Mutates:
      this
      Mutates properties:
      (...subgroups).getParentGroup()
      Postconditions:
      Objects.equals(getSubgroups(), List.of(subgroups))
      Arrays.stream(subgroups).allMatch(g -> g.getParentGroup() == this)
      getParentGroup() == null

  • Method Details

    • getSubgroups

      public List<ShapeGroup> getSubgroups()
      Returns the list of subgroups of this shape group, or null if this is a leaf shape group.
      Peer objects
      The elements of the array or collection object returned by this method, if any, are peer objects of this object.
      Basic inspector
      If a method uses a @mutates_properties clause to specify its effect, and some object O of this class is in the peer group of some object mentioned in the clause, and O.M() is not mentioned in the clause, where M is this method, then O.M remains unchanged.

    • getSubgroupCount

      public int getSubgroupCount()
      Returns the number of subgroups of this non-leaf shape group.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if this is a leaf shape group 
      getSubgroups() == null
      Postconditions:
      result == getSubgroups().size()

    • getSubgroup

      public ShapeGroup getSubgroup​(int index)
      Returns the subgroup at the given (zero-based) index in this non-leaf shape group's list of subgroups.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if this is a leaf shape group 
      getSubgroups() == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given index is out of bounds 
      index < 0 || getSubgroups().size() <= index
      Postconditions:
      result == getSubgroups().get(index)

    • getSubgroupAt

      public ShapeGroup getSubgroupAt​(IntPoint innerCoordinates)
      Return the first subgroup in this non-leaf shape group's list of subgroups whose bounding box contains the given point.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if this shape group is a leaf shape group 
      getSubgroups() == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if innerCoordinates is null 
      innerCoordinates == null
      Postconditions:
      Objects.equals(result,
    getSubgroups().stream().filter(g -> g.getBoundingBox().contains(innerCoordinates))
        .findFirst().orElse(null))

    • getAllShapes

      public List<RoundedPolygon> getAllShapes()
      Description copied from class: ShapeGroup
      Returns the list of the RoundedPolygon objects contained directly or indirectly by this shape group, in depth-first order.

    • getDrawingCommands

      public String getDrawingCommands()
      Description copied from class: ShapeGroup
      Returns a textual representation of a sequence of drawing commands for drawing the shapes contained directly or indirectly by this shape group. For the syntax of the drawing commands, see RoundedPolygon.getDrawingCommands().
      Specified by:
      getDrawingCommands in class ShapeGroup

      Specified by:
